data.database_description: This database is designed to manage and track various aspects of student and teacher interactions within an educational institution, focusing on incidents, detentions, and assessments. It includes tables for storing personal information about students and teachers, such as contact details and addresses, which are linked through foreign keys to ensure data integrity. The schema also covers incident management, detailing behavior-related events with types defined in a reference table, alongside the associated recommendations. Detention records are similarly managed with references to detention types. Additionally, the database tracks assessments conducted by teachers on students, providing a comprehensive view of student performance and incidents. Overall, it serves as an integrated system for handling administrative tasks related to disciplinary actions and academic evaluations within the institution.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier code for each address type.
Descriptive name of the address type, such as 'Billing' or 'Home'.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores types of addresses used within the institution, providing a reference for categorizing address data.

columns.columnDescription: Unique code representing a specific type of detention.
Description explaining the context or timing of the detention type.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Reference table defining various types of detentions with descriptions.

columns.columnDescription: Unique code representing a specific type of incident.
Description of the incident type associated with the code.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Defines various types of incidents that can occur, with descriptions.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each address
Primary street line of the address.
Secondary street line, if applicable.
Tertiary line of the address, for additional details.
City where the address is located.
Postal code associated with the address.
State, province, or county of the address.
Country where the address is situated.
Additional information related to the address.

sample_data: 1, 020 Orie Canyon, North Loyceville, 197, Hawaii, USA
2, 1333 Boyle Lane, West Sean, 937, Illinois, USA
3, 027 Kim Divide Apt. 492, Beierview, 918, Texas, USA
enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores comprehensive details of physical addresses associated with individuals or entities within the institution.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each student
Reference to the address associated with the student
The first name of the student
The middle name of the student
The last name of the student
Contact mobile number for the student
Email address for contacting the student
Date when the student first enrolled or rented university services
Date when the student left the university
Additional details about the student not covered by other fields

sample_data: 1, 19, Emma, Frederic, Rohan, 235.899.9744, derrick.jenkins@example.com, 2017-12-05 15:20:04, 2018-03-03 03:33:05, first honor
2, 9, Louvenia, Fatima, Hansen, 1-247-673-8446, rohan.clarabelle@example.org, 2017-08-08 22:30:36, 2018-02-24 11:12:11, first honor
3, 10, Rhea, Gardner, Bergnaum, 1-751-162-9676x115, kkirlin@example.org, 2017-11-15 04:57:28, 2018-03-19 12:49:20, first honor
enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores personal and enrollment information about students.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each teacher.
Identifier linking to a specific address from the Addresses table.
Teacher's first name.
Teacher's middle name, if any.
Teacher's last name.
Gender of the teacher, represented by a single character (e.g., '1' for male).
Contact number for reaching the teacher via mobile phone.
Email address to contact the teacher.
Additional information about the teacher, such as role or title (e.g., Dean).

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Contains personal and contact information for teachers, including their roles within the institution.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each set of assessment notes.
Identifier linking the note to a specific student.
Identifier linking the note to a specific teacher who conducted the assessment.
Timestamp of when the notes were recorded.
Main content or observations noted during the assessment.
Additional information related to the assessment notes.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores notes related to student assessments conducted by teachers, including details and timestamps.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each incident.
Code representing the type of incident, linked to Ref_Incident_Type.
Identifier for the student involved in the incident, linked to Students table.
The date and time when the incident began.
The date and time when the incident ended.
A brief summary of what happened during the incident.
Suggested actions or consequences for handling the incident.
Additional information about the incident not covered elsewhere in the record.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Records details of behavior-related incidents involving students.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each detention record.
Code referencing the type of detention from a reference table.
Identifier linking to the teacher responsible for administering the detention.
Timestamp marking the start of the detention period.
Timestamp marking the end of the detention period.
Brief summary providing context or details about the detention incident.
Additional information relevant to the detention not covered in other columns.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Records details of detention incidents for students, including timing and responsible teacher.

columns.columnDescription: Identifier for the student linked to the address.
Reference to the specific address in the Addresses table.
Start date of when the student resides at this address.
End date of residency for this particular address.
Monthly rental cost associated with the student's residence.
Additional details about the housing arrangement or specifics.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Links student records with their respective addresses and includes rental details and validity period.

columns.columnDescription: Identifier linking the record to a specific student.
Identifier linking the record to a specific detention event.
Identifier linking the record to a specific behavioral incident.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Tracks associations between students, detentions, and incidents.
